actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $100,000.

summary.text: Increases the estate tax exemption from $60,000 to $100,000, under the Internal Revenue Code. Provides that where there is a gross estate of less than $100,000, a return with respect to such estate need not be filed by the executor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $100,000.
